projectTitle: Personal Website for Software Tester - [Your Name]
description: Professional portfolio to showcase software testing and quality assurance (QA) skills and tools.

styleGuide.visualInspiration: Inspired by the attached 'Frontend Quiz' screenshots. Use a deep grayish-blue/purple background and a vibrant bright purple (#9333EA) as the main accent color (for CTA buttons, highlight, and progress bars). Implement large, rounded-corner cards with colorful, distinct icons for the 'Skills' and 'Tools' sections, exactly like the subject selection screen (HTML, CSS, JS cards) to give a clean and interactive feel.

sections.title: Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer
sections.content: Specialized in bug detection and performance improvement. I turn code into a reliable product. Experience in manual and automated testing.

items.description: Verify that the product matches client requirements.
Writing and executing Selenium and Cypress scripts.
Using JMeter to ensure system speed and responsiveness.
Ensuring website compliance with WCAG standards (inspired by the existing icon).

sections.title: Latest Projects
sections.content: Discover how I contributed to launching high-quality, bug-free applications.

sections.title: Get in Touch to Start Your Project
sections.content: Need rigorous testing? Please fill out the form and I'll get back to you.
